scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && rimraf platforms/ios && tns run ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd ../demo && rimraf platforms/android && tns run android
scripts.test: npm run tslint && npm run tslint.demo && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns build android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run tsc && npm run package && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-login-with-amazon && tns plugin add ../publish/package/*.tgz && tns install
scripts.build: npm i && tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-login-with-amazon && cd ../src
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-login-with-amazon && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
